message: My #AngularJS video now has 150 views http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=klQtUXijo4E What would you like my next quick video to be about? Asking for diversity!
name: Simple Angular.JS Demo: Using HTML Directives Even Without JavaScript Controllers
description: This video is to test how it's like to upload videos on YouTube. In this video we watch how the template engine provided by Angular.JS can do so much for us....

data.message: Very nice and straightforward ya basha, I loved it
It is great. I suggest talking about Source Control (git and github) in Visual Studio 2012 after 'Update 2'
Thanks a lot Hossam and Ahmed.

Moutaz, thank you. I maily focus on the classic git tools, GitExtensions and of course the Console. I don't use the visual Studio support for anything serious (maybe when libgit2 adds rebase support), nor even Github for Windows. Not to mention Git is quite opinionated, and I'm trying to avoid contraversal topics at this stage.
the official video is not bad at all though: http://channel9.msdn.com/posts/GitForVisualStudioTFS
Have you thought about making videos in Arabic? I know that 99% of the content is in English, but that's the problem

The main reason that got me into trying out the process after years of not taking action was some internal recordings we started in Readify. That's why my mind was more into the English speaking audience (making sure it's simple enough for non-natives like Egyptians).
There is some localization-related idea though that will be nice in Arabic. Considering it now.
Thanks for the support BTW, definitely seeing your videos come up was also encouraging for me :)
Let me know if you are intersted in making one on one video tutorials together, I think this can be interesting

boor recording, i couldn't see any thing when you type
so i tried to imagine what you are talking about !!!
but great effort by the way, Thanks
You probably have low quality setting, maybe due to "poor" connection speed or whatever. Try to change it to 720p.
Ok, will try it again isA
